description:
Mai and Atsushi find themselves stranded and surrounded by the enemy. With Mai injured and an extraction impossible, their chances are grim. Merry Christmas.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Long Night: In the Forests of Nights
Nagai yoru - In The Forests Of Nights -
長い夜 - In The Forests Of Nights -
긴 밤: In The Forests Of Night
